price: Na wao husema: Mbona hakuteremshiwa Malaika? Na kama tungeli teremsha Malaika, basi bila ya shaka ingesha hukumiwa amri, tena hapo wasingeli pewa muhula.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞۖ وَلَوۡ أَنزَلۡنَا مَلَكٗا لَّقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ ثُمَّ لَا يُنظَرُونَ
footnotes: Tena wanasema: Tunataka Mwenyezi Mungu amteremshia Malaika huyu anaye dai Utume amsadikishe! Na lau kuwa Sisi tungeli waitikia hilo ombi lao, tukampeleka Malaika kama walivyo toa shauri, kisha wakafanya inda yao wasimuamini, basi amri ya kuwaangamiza ingesha pitishwa, tena hao wasinge pewa muhula hata chembe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi malakun walaw anzalnā malakan laquḍiya al-amru thumma lā yunẓarūna
translations: respite would have been granted to them
